mapper.insert: insert into work_reply( reply_num, reply_id, reply_date, reply_content, reply_file_name, reply_file_path, reply_file_size, work_num ) values( work_reply_reply_num_seq.nextval, #{replyId}, sysdate, #{replyContent}, #{replyFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyFilePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyFileSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workNum} )
mapper.select: select reply_file_name, reply_file_size, reply_file_path from work_reply where reply_num = ${replyNum}
select * from work_reply where work_num = #{workNum} order by reply_num
